alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 12:02AM CST until February 16 at 12:30AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CST FOR WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 1202 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Tontitown to 2 miles west of Devils Den State Park, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Greenland... Winslow... Blackburn... Brentwood... Strickler... Drake Field Airport... Johnson... Goshen... Walnut Grove... Woolsey... Wheeler... Sonora... Wyola... Prairie Grove Battlefield State... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 42 and 71. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
